studentOrganizer

Class Semester

  • java.lang.Object
    • studentOrganizer.Semester

  • public class Semester
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a semester with a number of classes being taken by the particular student, a list of the courses being taken,a grade for the semester. and a string showing when the semester is taking place
    Author:
    cevans0971

      • calculateSemesterGrade

        public void calculateSemesterGrade()
        This method calculates the final gpa for the semester by going through each couse, adding the final grade and multiplying by the credits and then dividing by the total credits. It is assumed the student will not get a zero
